## Description

lapply_flex


## Usage

```r
lapply_flex(X, FUN, cores = NA, fun = NULL, ...)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`X`     |     list to use
`FUN`     |     function to be performed
`cores`     |     cores to use
`fun`     |     deprecated. Backwards compatibility for FUN
`...`     |     other arguments to pass
